query:
-- Get total California protocol count
SELECT 
    c.state,
    COUNT(DISTINCT c.id) as agency_count,
    COUNT(p.id) as protocol_count
FROM counties c
LEFT JOIN protocolChunks p ON c.id = p.countyId
WHERE c.state = 'California'
GROUP BY c.state;

-- Get counts for the three newly added counties
SELECT 
    c.name,
    COUNT(p.id) as protocol_count
FROM counties c
LEFT JOIN protocolChunks p ON c.id = p.countyId
WHERE c.name LIKE '%San Joaquin%' 
   OR c.name LIKE '%Riverside%'
   OR c.name LIKE '%Contra Costa%'
GROUP BY c.name;

-- Get counts for the three newly added counties
